document_data.caption: A map showing the Trade Way in Daggerford.
document_data.name: Trade Way (Daggerford)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Trade Way''' was a road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The Trade Way was found in the southern section of Daggerford, running east to west in between the drill fields and the [[Hill Road]]. Both the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] and [[Water Street]] connected to the Trade Way.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along the Trade Way included:

* [[Korbus's Jewelry and Fine Ornaments]]
* The [[Blacksmiths' Guildhouse]]
* [[Chateau Elite]]
* Daggerford's jail
